Package persistence

Class PostgreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • persistence.PostgreManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistenceInterface
    public class PostgreManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistenceInterface
    responsible for managing DAO classes and keeping the Dependency Inversion principle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private ChatDAO chatDAO
      ChatDAO instance
      private DepartmentDAO departmentDAO
      DepartmentDAO instance
      private EmployeeDAO employeeDAO
      EmployeeDAO instance
      private MessageDAO messageDAO
      MessageDAO instance

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PostgreManager​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      takes postgre server credentials and initializes all DAO instances

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Chat> getAllChats()
      uses chatDAO to return all stored chats
      java.util.ArrayList<Department> getAllDepartments()
      uses departmentDAO to return all stored departments
      java.util.ArrayList<Employee> getAllEmployees()
      uses employeeDAO to return all stored employees
      java.util.ArrayList<Message> getAllMessages()
      uses messageDAO to return all stored messages
      Chat newChat​(java.lang.String name, boolean isGroup, int[] members)
      uses chatDAO to return a newly created chat read from the database with the values inputted in the constructor
      Department newDepartment()
      uses departmentDAO to return a newly created department with default values
      Employee newEmployee()
      uses employeeDAO to return a newly created employee with default values
      Message newMessage​(java.lang.String message, int sender, int chatID)
      uses messageDAO to return a newly created message read from the database with the values inputted in the constructor
      void removeChat​(int chatID)
      uses chatDAO to delete a chat
      void removeDepartment​(int departmentID)
      uses departmentDAO to delete a department
      Chat updateChat​(Chat chat)
      uses chatDAO to update a chat's attributes and returns a chat which matches the updated data, read from the database
      (this is used to ensure that the business layer has the same data which is in the database)
      Department updateDepartment​(Department department)
      uses departmentDAO to update a department's attributes and returns a department which matches the updated data, read from the database
      (this is used to ensure that the business layer has the same data which is in the database)
      Employee updateEmployee​(Employee employee)
      uses employeeDAO to update an employee's attributes and returns an employee which matches the updated data, read from the database
      (this is used to ensure that the business layer has the same data which is in the database)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
